messages.subject: Name that family!

messages.messageBody:
Hello knowledgeable people----I'm trying to track down the kamon that
appears on a kimono I found on ebay (man, I need to stay away from
there!) I looked in the list that Okita posted back in message 704 but
it wasn't on their list.

If anyone has time I put a scan of it in the photos section of the
group (on page 2) and if you can't identify it maybe you can direct me
to other sites with kamon displayed?

Thanks

Barb Sheridan
